attributes.action: introduce legislation to ensure that social networking websites are required to remove content that constitutes cyber-bullying when requested by schools etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The incidence of cyber-bullying through social networking websites is increasing very quickly.
These sites encourage users to gather as 'school' communities even though this is not offically sanctioned or regulated by schools.
When cyber-bullying takes place, school have no power over the site or its content.  The sites regularly fail to respond to school leaders requesting information or action.
